using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.SimpleClassInheritance.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial interface IClass
	{
		Task ReadFileAsync();
	}

	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial class BaseClass : IClass
	{
		public virtual Task ReadFileAsync()
		{
			return Task.CompletedTask;
		}
	}

	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial class DerivedClass : BaseClass
	{
		public override Task ReadFileAsync()
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}
	}

	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial class TestCase
	{
		public Task ReadAsync()
		{
			return new DerivedClass().ReadFileAsync();
		}
	}
}
